title: Riot, Please look at this blatant Maokai copy in another game.
body: As some may see, this is an almost exact copy of Maokai, hopefully Riot can see this and send a cease and desist to this company and remove this blatant rip. Good luck to Riot if they choose to pursue this legally.

replies.body:
Most of Riot's champions/skins are copies or 'inspired' from other characters in games/comics/anime/real life etc etc

its a marketing tactic, for example if you like Metal Gear Solid you are more likely to buy PROJECT: Yasuo because you make that connection.

So when you use so much content from other companies, i dont think you can complain when one of them uses yours.

but that is a very blatant copy (assuming maokai came first, if he didn't then he is the copy)
yeah cause riots never stolen a champion from another game or anything.
nek level league of angels, Hottest Game where you wont see your boyfriend for weeks apparently
Well yeah because the game is that bad you have to commit seppuku for actually opening the game.

It's a tree that's on fire, are we pretending that it means that this thing is a straight up copy of maokai?

Not to mention like has already been mentioned with frozen shen, a huge amount of skins in league take "inspiration" from other sources.

Top left corner of the right side of the image

"charred maokai skin"

And in the top right corner of the left image (not the entire facebook post but just the image) says maokai clone

Unless of course old bloke here has edited the image, which basically makes these images invalid for evidence due to tampering, becuase outside of the slight visual similarities those names are the only reason i agree with him.

Those names are my assumption as to him editing to tell us the difference (i think he thinks we are stupid), i seriously doubt that a shitty rip off game would be that blatant about their theft. (not that Facebook gives a shit one way or the other)
Have you seen axe from dota

I dont think riot wants to open that pandoras box given stuff like frozen shen etc etc.

http://img1.goodfon.su/original/1024x1024/5/97/sub-zero-mortal-kombat-x-fan-3867.jpg?d=1

http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Shen_1.jpg
There are so many knock-off games.
